definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

pinyin: hun1 qian2 cai2 chan3 gong1 zheng4

sentences.english: Want to be an assistant judge or notary.
sentences.chinese: 想成为一名助理法官或公证人。

sentences.english: We have the best surveyor， China Import and Export Commodity Inspection Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 我们有最好的公证行，即中国进出口商品检验局。

sentences.english: Notarization only and should not make legal sense be regarded as real estate transactions.
sentences.chinese: 公证只和不应该使法律意义上被视为房地产交易。

sentences.english: Others have expressed fear of the election will be ragged( rigged ).
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人表现除了对选举公证性的担忧。

sentences.english: Which country will your notarial certificate be used in?
sentences.chinese: 您办理的公证书将在哪个国家使用？

sentences.english: My bank statement has been notarized.
sentences.chinese: 我的银行证明已经公证过了。

sentences.english: The party concerned refuses to pay the notarization fees according to relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 当事人拒绝按照规定支付公证费的。

sentences.english: Where the supporting materials are insufficient, the notarial institution may ask him to supplement the materials.
sentences.chinese: 提供的证明材料不充分的，公证机构可以要求补充。

sentences.english: Thus, the seller would become notaries employers.
sentences.chinese: 这样，卖方等于成了公证人的雇主。

sentences.english: Article 34 The party concerned shall pay notarization fees in accordance with the relevant provisions.
sentences.chinese: 第三十四条当事人应当按照规定支付公证费。
阁下的签名必须被公证。

sentences.english: A notary shall join in the local and national notarization associations.
sentences.chinese: 公证员应当加入地方和全国的公证协会。

sentences.english: A notary shall join in the local and national notarization associations.
sentences.chinese: 公证员应当加入地方和全国的公证协会。

sentences.english: The facts proved by the effective documents of notarization.
sentences.chinese: 已为有效公证文书所证明的事实。

sentences.english: The notarial certificate comes into effect as of the date of issuance.
sentences.chinese: 公证书自出具之日起生效。

sentences.english: We have the best surveyor, China ImportExport Commodity Inspection Bureau .
sentences.chinese: 有最好的公证行，即中国进出口商品检验局。

pinyin: hun1 qian2 cai2 chan3 gong1 zheng4

definition: to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
